name: Auto-Defense
description:
AUTO-DEFENSE is a tower defense game, in top view, made with "Unity".

You have a shop, allowing you to buy turrets and place them on turret bases. Enemies are spawning by each waves automatically after you beat the last one. Turrets will aim automatically to enemies in it's range, making you to earn money. Money is used to upgrade the shop (increasing number of slots available for turrets and adding new turrets in the shop) or refreshing the shop. 

Specificity of the game,  when you place a turret, it gives his boost to adjacent turrets:

  • Black: No bonus
  • LightBlue: Freeze (slow down enemies)
  • Green: Increase range
  • Orange: Increase firerate
  • Red: Increase damage
  • Blue: Double damage

_______________________________________________________________

VICTORY CONDITIONS:

  • Have 1 hp or more at the end of all waves

_______________________________________________________________

CONTROLS (only keyboard and numpad):

Player 1:

  • Drag & drop to place a turret
  • LeftClic to level up or refresh the shop
  • Hold LeftClic to aim and shoot (for the last gamemode only)

_______________________________________________________________

Made by Bédu Louis, Technical Game Designer, in only 1 week!
